about.intro: I am a current Computer Science graduate from the University of South Florida, and I bring a robust background in problem-solving and coding cultivated through a diverse array of technologies, including Python, Django, Flask, MySQL, MongoDB, HTML5/CSS, and Java.
about.experience: With around 3 years of professional experience, I have strengthened my proficiency in Cloud Technologies and DevOps. My passion lies in the development of sophisticated applications aimed at solving real-world problems that impact a substantial user base.
about.goal: Looking for an opportunity to work in a challenging position combining my skills in Software Engineering, Data Science which provides professional development, interesting experiences and personal growth.

responsibilities: Built an automated file scan service using Apache Airflow that performs malware scan on all external files and transfers to the desired destination, used by more than 20 teams and over 1 million files transferred.
Designed and developed new features for the environment, fixed various bugs, critical production and performance issues
Created and managed various AWS resources using Terraform
Tools: Apache Airflow, Python, Terraform, Linux, Jenkins, Jira, AWS - EC2, S3, VPC and other services
